main event: A UFO sighting was reported on September 22, 1963, based on ground radar observations indicating a probable sighting.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15 minutes,The UFO was described as round with red-green flashing lights,The sighting was made by a citizen farmer whose reliability is unknown,Weather conditions were clear with good visibility during the observation,The radar activity was noted to last from 7:25 p.m. to 8:30 p.m. ET on September 22.
sighted object: one round object with red-green flashing lights
location: 4 miles north of Herkimer, New York, USA
witness description: citizen farmer from Middletown, New York, reliability unknown
